Name: Glitch Assassin
About the game: As The Earth ran dry of resources, wars continued to rage on and pollution reached an all time high, the human race created an AI system and tasked it with one purpose... Save the planet by any means necessary. Play as an assassin tasked with maintaining order amongst the human race, completing various missions eliminating threats to the AI's directive of saving the planet from extinction... Face the harsh realities of what it will cost and come to terms with your purpose. In each mission you must take cover and use quick head movement combined with accurate shooting to progress through and clear each sector. Load up at HQ with weapon customisation to become a more deadly assassin with each mission or try complete challenges to better your skills. WMR headsets will have to manually set the controller bindings as follows: Triggers - 'GrabPinch' Grips - 'GrabGrip' Up on joystick - DropMag Right/Left on Joystick - SnapTurnLeft/Right
